name: Mini Legions
description:
From the developers of 20 millions downloaded Mini Warriors.

The darkness come back to the continent Panop. Summon the legendary heroes from 4 unique factions to build a grand army of epic legions. Conquer the lands, dungeons, beat evil dragons and mages and write down your golories!

Features:

- Thousands of units on the new 3D battlefield
- Hundreds of legendary heroes powered by various super abilities
- Simply draw pathes to form dynamic strategies
- Exquisite and vivid cartoonish style
- 9 realms, 400 missions to conquer
- Form alliances for joint conquest and world wars
- Rich offline idle rewards to collect, never lose a penny
